document_data.name: ''Talisman Staff''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Talisman Staff''''' was an [[Enchanted weapon|enchanted]] [[staff]] of [[dwarven]] design that belonged to the inhabitants of the [[House of Gems]] in [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: ''Talisman staff'' was a simple metal rod encrusted with small [[Gemstone|gemstones]].
document_data.Powers: The staff increased the user's wisdom and charisma.
document_data.History: One of these ancient ''talisman staffs'' from the glory days of Myth Drannor could be found in the ruins of the House of Gems ''circa'' [[1369 DR]].
